game.name: FIND ALL 8: The road to the Maya
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Immerse yourself in an exciting adventure in Find All 8: The road to the Maya. You will have to explore colorful city streets, unique jungle views and ancient temples of a lost civilization. Look for hidden objects and color this mysterious painted world.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Immerse yourself in an exciting adventure in Find All 8: The road to the Maya. You will have to explore colorful city streets, unique jungle views and ancient temples of a lost civilization. Look for hidden objects and color this mysterious painted world.

reviewHighlights.text: Great game! Can't wait to play the next one.
